channel.title: Ice barrage work properly ffs!11
channel.description: after using the ice barrage spell or any other ancient spell in hellzend, the caster runs next to the npc or player it attacked, does any1 know how to stop the players running into melee combat range after casting the spell???? :confused:

item.title: Ice barrage work properly ffs!11
item.dc:creator: @d3adp00l d3adp00l
item.description:
@d3adp00l wrote:

are u trying to attack to fast because i have that same code in my client.jav and when i attack people or npcs i dont go towards them i stay where i was atâ€¦

Read full topic

item.title: Ice barrage work properly ffs!11
item.dc:creator: @the_onion the onion
item.description:
@the_onion wrote:

thats already there

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= -93 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 6)==true)) { deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1); deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1); deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1); startAnimation(1979); attackNPCSWithin(369, 39, 0); //hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(30); server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 10; sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); //stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }
this is the code for ice barrage in client.java

Read full topic
